description:
At Audible, we believe stories have the power to transform lives. It’s why we work with some of the world’s leading creators to produce and share audio storytelling with our millions of global listeners. We are dreamers and inventors who come from a wide range of backgrounds and experiences to empower and inspire each other. Imagine your future with us.

ABOUT THIS ROLE
This opportunity is for a Director, Software Development who will manage and grow one or more engineering teams for Audible’s Machine Learning Engineering (MLE) team. MLE will build out the core platforms and assets to enable informed data-driven decisions in order to improve Audible's overall value to the customer. The team enables Automation, self-service mechanisms, and infrastructure improvements that will allow data scientists to experiment and add novel features more quickly, and enable both existing and new models in production to retrain more frequently to be more responsive to customer behavior. Achieving this vision means continuously innovating, enhancing the tools and strengthening our development process, how we work and leveraging new technologies to deliver services. We need your help to develop and deliver on this global vision.

As a Director, Software Development, you will...
- Lead cross-functional project delivery across Audible and Amazon teams
- Promote development and operational excellence for our flagship solutions
- Mentor and support high-performing engineers, fostering their growth and expertise
- Collaborate with diverse teams to create innovative software that captivates our community and motivates our colleagues
- Handle all aspects of software development, including operational metrics and support for your team's software
- Drive continuous improvement of delivery performance and quality in an agile environment
- Take charge of 1-2 Scrum teams

ABOUT AUDIBLE
Audible is the leading producer and provider of audio storytelling. We spark listeners’ imaginations, offering immersive, cinematic experiences full of inspiration and insight to enrich our customers daily lives. Our Hub+Home hybrid workplace model gives employees the flexibility between gathering in a common office space (work from hub) and remote work (work from home). For more information, please visit adbl.co/hybrid.

We are open to hiring candidates to work out of one of the following locations:

Newark, NJ, USA
